message:
SYSTEM: EN_%28wiki%29_terminology_in_ontologies_08-10-09%28V3%29.pdf: Página 35
35
Lexicons
Generally, of two types
• general
–contain language used in all/general contexts
• specific
–contain the language used in a specific domain of knowledge
Implications of both types of lexicons
–Quantity and quality of information (granularity)
–Complexity of the design
–Complexity in the development process
speaker: SYSTEM
